events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle striking a tree at a sharp turn.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords found in the description.
An experienced agent was assigned promptly to handle the vehicle collision claim efficiently.
The insurer acknowledged receipt of the automobile accident claim and informed the customer.
Requested relevant documents including police report, vehicle registration, and photos of the damage.
Customer submitted all requested documents promptly, facilitating faster claim processing.
The investigation team began assessing the accident circumstances and vehicle damages.
Investigation concluded with a detailed report confirming the collision damages and liability.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on damage estimates and policy terms.
Customer responded expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and quick handling.
Claim approval was granted after confirmation of settlement acceptance by the customer.
Payment for the approved claim amount was successfully transferred to the customerâ€™s account.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed following full payment issuance.
